summary: ENGINE FAILURE DUE TO COMPLETE FAILURE OF 2 IGNITION COILS.  CAR DOES NOT GET POWER, OPERATES AT DANGEROUSLY LOW SPEEDS, ESPECIALLY WHEN YOU'RE ON THE HIGHWAY.  ACKNOWLEDGED BY DEALER AS A MAJOR PROBLEM WITH 2002 1.8TURBO VW/AUDI ENGINES.  MANUFACTURER DEFECT BUT WILL ONLY PERMIT REPLACEMENT OF COILS THAT ARE "BAD" EVEN THOUGH THEY KNOW THE OTHERS MAY GO TOO.
